statements: SELECT * FROM telecardiology_billing;
SELECT patient_name, insurance_provider, billing_code FROM telecardiology_billing;
SELECT DISTINCT insurance_provider FROM telecardiology_billing;
SELECT patient_name, billing_code, claim_status FROM telecardiology_billing WHERE billing_code > 1000;
SELECT * FROM telecardiology_billing ORDER BY billing_code DESC;
SELECT * FROM telecardiology_billing WHERE patient_id = 1
SELECT patient_name, billing_code FROM telecardiology_billing WHERE billing_code > 100
SELECT * FROM telecardiology_billing WHERE claim_status = 'Denied' ORDER BY billing_code DESC
SELECT DISTINCT insurance_provider FROM telecardiology_billing
SELECT patient_name, claim_status FROM telecardiology_billing WHERE billing_code BETWEEN 50 AND 100
SELECT * FROM telecardiology_services;
SELECT service_type, service_cost FROM telecardiology_services WHERE service_date > '2021-01-01';
SELECT patient_id, doctor_id, service_type FROM telecardiology_services ORDER BY service_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM insurance_claims WHERE claim_status = 'pending';
SELECT patient_id, insurance_company, claim_amount FROM insurance_claims WHERE claim_amount > 1000 ORDER BY claim_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM telecardiology_services WHERE service_cost > 1000 ORDER BY service_date DESC;
SELECT doctor_id, COUNT(1) as service_count FROM telecardiology_services GROUP BY doctor_id ORDER BY service_count DESC;
SELECT patient_id, insurance_company, claim_amount FROM insurance_claims WHERE claim_status = 'approved' AND claim_amount < 5000;
SELECT service_type, AVG(service_cost) as avg_cost FROM telecardiology_services GROUP BY service_type HAVING avg_cost > 1500;
SELECT * FROM telecardiology_services WHERE service_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-08-31' AND service_type = 'Cardiology' ORDER BY service_cost ASC;
SELECT * FROM TelecardiologyPatients;
SELECT patient_name, patient_age FROM TelecardiologyPatients ORDER BY patient_age DESC;
SELECT patient_name, insurance_provider FROM TelecardiologyPatients WHERE insurance_provider = 'XYZ Insurance';
SELECT appointment_id, appointment_date, doctor_id FROM TelecardiologyAppointments WHERE appointment_status = 'Scheduled';
SELECT patient_name, bill_amount FROM TelecardiologyPatients INNER JOIN TelecardiologyBilling ON TelecardiologyPatients.patient_id = TelecardiologyBilling.patient_id;
SELECT * FROM TelecardiologyPatients WHERE patient_age > 30 ORDER BY patient_name ASC;
SELECT patient_name, insurance_provider FROM TelecardiologyPatients WHERE insurance_provider = 'ABC Insurance';
SELECT patient_name, appointment_date, appointment_status FROM TelecardiologyAppointments WHERE appointment_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT COUNT(*) AS appointment_count FROM TelecardiologyAppointments WHERE appointment_status = 'Scheduled';
SELECT patient_name, bill_amount FROM TelecardiologyPatients P JOIN TelecardiologyBilling B ON P.patient_id = B.patient_id WHERE B.bill_amount > 1000 ORDER BY bill_amount DESC;
SELECT * FROM telecardiology_patient;
SELECT name, dob, address FROM telecardiology_patient;
SELECT appointment_id, appointment_date, duration_minutes FROM telecardiology_appointment;
SELECT service_name, description, cost FROM telecardiology_services;
SELECT claim_id, appointment_id, service_id, claim_date, status FROM telecardiology_claims;
SELECT * FROM telecardiology_patient ORDER BY dob ASC;
SELECT appointment_id, patient_id, doctor_id, appointment_date FROM telecardiology_appointment WHERE duration_minutes > 30;
SELECT service_name, cost FROM telecardiology_services WHERE cost BETWEEN 100.00 AND 500.00 ORDER BY service_name DESC;
SELECT patient_id, name, address FROM telecardiology_patient WHERE dob > '1990-01-01';
SELECT claim_id, appointment_id, service_id, claim_date, status FROM telecardiology_claims ORDER BY claim_date DESC;
SELECT * FROM billing ORDER BY billing_date DESC LIMIT 10;
SELECT insurance_company, policy_number FROM insurance WHERE patient_id = 1001;
SELECT service_type, service_cost, service_date FROM telecardiology_services WHERE patient_id = 2002 ORDER BY service_cost DESC;
SELECT description, amount FROM financial_operations WHERE operation_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-06-30';
SELECT patient_id, claim_status, processing_date FROM claims_processing WHERE claim_status = 'Pending';
SELECT * FROM billing WHERE patient_id = 123;
SELECT insurance_company, policy_holder_name FROM insurance ORDER BY policy_holder_name;
SELECT SUM(amount) AS total_amount FROM billing WHERE billing_date BETWEEN '2022-01-01' AND '2022-12-31';
SELECT operation_type, operation_date, description FROM financial_operations WHERE amount > 1000 ORDER BY operation_date DESC;
SELECT patient_id, claim_status, submitted_date FROM claims_processing WHERE claim_status = 'pending' ORDER BY submitted_date LIMIT 5;
